src_original: tadyathā yasi ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ muruḥ svāhā /
namo ratnatrayāya /  nama āryāvalokiteśvaraya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /  tadyathā sāde sāde sidi sidi sudu sudu svāhā /  balinivedanamantra ekaviṃśatijāpena /  namo ratnatrayāya /
ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
tadyathā thiri thiri dhiri dhiri svāhā /
